casebody.data:
Harrah's Ohio Acquisition Co., L.L.C.
v.
Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision 2016-0568 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 17, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On the unopposed motion of Harrah's Ohio Acquisition Company, L.L.C, to reschedule June 19, 2018 oral argument before a master commissioner. Motion granted. Oral argument before a master commissioner rescheduled for June 28, 2018.
